title: I want to earn $17,000 in the next 2 years. How can I do that? - Quora
tags: Advice About Wanting and Making Money

response.answer_text: 1 - Start a Youtube channel of your interest ,work hard on it for 1 year , get it monetized & you will start receiving passive income. 2 - Join Quora partner program , be active on it answer questions & ask questions , & soon you will start earning. 3 - Invest in short term stocks 4 - Keep your day job if you have , & do above things as a side hustle. 5 - Spend only on necessities & put a break on your wishes & material things you want to buy.
